COMMAND.name: save
COMMAND.help: Save dynamic route changes.

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save dynamic routes changes and exit current mode.

COMMAND.name: cancel
COMMAND.help: Roll back rip configuration changes.

COMMAND.name: direction
COMMAND.help: rip direction None, In only, Out only, Both.

PARAM.help: rip direction .

COMMAND.name: version
COMMAND.help: Rip version

PARAM.help: Rip version

COMMAND.name: net routing dynamic
COMMAND.help: Configure the routes dynamically.

COMMAND.name: show net routing dynamic
COMMAND.help: Show dynamic routing setup

COMMAND.name: net routing dynamic configure
COMMAND.help: configure the routes dynamically.

COMMAND.name: show net routing dynamic setup
COMMAND.help: Show dynamic routing Setup.
COMMAND.DETAIL:
This command shows the Dynamic Routing Setup.
<RIP Direction>: <RIP Version>: <Authentication Type for RIP-2B/2M >: <If Authentication is enabled then First Key Parameters>: <If Authentication is enabled then Second Key Parameters>: <RPING Status>:
